I currently have a module at the bottom of these posts that’s using related_blog_posts to show them the next post they should go to. However, i’d rather it just suggest the next post (based on publish date).

Best way to do this and make sure to pull in the correct info of the post (featured image etc.)

Example: <https://revops.io/customers/muckrack>
you could  do via custom fields: <https://www.stephanieogaygarcia.com/HubSpot-website-development/adding-custom-fields-to-HubSpot-blog-posts>
Reminder: Used to PHP and are looking to learn HubL? Here’s a comparison: <https://youtu.be/xKjozJNzWSk>
